Solutions & Products



Special Services for Businesses





SMALL-SCALE BUSINESS
LARGE-SCALE BUSINESS
Data Center


Secure your business with TR7

Reliable Security

Effective protection, learning and signature-based security with Positive and Negative WAF. Protocol authentication (HTTP) and full protection against denial of service attacks (DoS, DDoS), worms, SQL code injections, etc. Traffic manipulation and advanced URL filtering with authentication-based restriction capability.

High Performance

High speed caching system to free up your web servers and reduce page load times. Traffic compression and HTTP authentication/ authorization cache. TCP / HTTP acceleration through buffering and adjusting server link density with dynamic load balancing.

Multilayer Load Balancing

Load-Balancing supports different protocols (HTTP, DNS, SMTP, IMAP, POP3 etc.) for Layer3 and Layer7 load balancing. All IPv4 and IPv6 protocols, SNI-SSL based virtual hosts, content-based intelligent query routing (content change), reverse proxy, NAT, direct server converter and non-VIP modes are all supported.

  • Network Load Balancing (Layer 4)
    • TCP & UDP Port Transfer
    • Direct DNS Load Balancing
    • Service Routing
    • Full Transparency (client IP → backend servers)
  • Load Balancing (Layer 7)
  • All IPv4 and IPv6 protocols
  • SNI-SSL based virtual host support
  • Native support for Web Services and Web Sockets (via Configuration Management API)
  • Content-based, Intelligent Query Routing (content change)
  • Session continuity and maintenance management using cookies
  • Learning application cookies like PHPSESSID, JSESSIONID, ASP.NET SessionID and others
  • Traffic Congestion
  • Copy session state between all parallel TR7s.
  • Wide selection of balancing algorithms (round-robin, leastconn, hash ...)
  • Seamless server startup and shutdown
  • Hash algorithms optimized for Proxy Farms
  • Supports reverse proxy, NAT, Direct Server Converter and non-VIP modes
  • Global Load Balancing (Load balancing concept to different data centers and even countries)
  • Load Balancing for Microsoft products
    • Exchange, SharePoint, Lync, etc

  • High speed caching system to free up your web servers and reduce page load times
  • Object Caching
  • All images, JavaScript, stylesheets and all possible static page content
  • Simple programming features such as constants, conditional expressions, and subroutines
  • Intelligently adjust expiration times, content settings, compression
  • Content Creation
    • Add a title item to the document if it is not already there.
    • Combine multiple CSS elements.
    • Combine multiple script items together.
    • Add a response header for each Meta tag with the http-equiv attribute.
    • Convert larger JPEGs to progressive format.
    • Extend the cache life of CSS, JS, and non-optimized images by signing the URLs with a content mix.
    • Rewrite the references referenced in any CSS file that could not be otherwise parsed or reduced.
    • Import CSS codes by including all import rules
    • Export small CSS files to HTML document
    • Import style tags that contain only CSS imports by converting them to equivalent link tags.
    • Import small JS files into HTML document.
    • Rewrite CSS files to remove excess spaces and comments. If enabled, rewrite images referenced in CSS files or extend cache.
    • Optimize images, recode, remove excess pixels and overlay small images.
    • Rewrite JavaScript files to remove excess spaces and comments.
    • Rewrite CSS in style attributes in the text.
    • Cache-protected content
  • Traffic Compression
  • HTTP Authentication and Authorization Cache
  • Cleaning
  • Preventing Internal Server Errors
  • Filter any part of the client's request and the server's response.

  • Continuous server and application health audits
  • Traffic peak smoothing to protect servers against overloads
  • Management of problem mode if a production server crashes (redirection to standby server)
  • Session persistence and maintenance agreement on TR7 while in standby mode

  • Supports VLAN (802.1q), multiple VPN (IPSec or SSL)
  • Network interface bridging and binding
  • Supports Syslog, SNMP, traps SNMP, VRRP (& CARP) and NTP standards
  • VRRP (& CARP) and NTP standards
  • Integration in proxy or transparent proxy mode
  • Advanced monitoring and logging of the status, connection details and activity statistics of servers and applications.
  • Web or CLI management interface (SSH or serial port access)
  • Diagnostics tools
  • Multilayer management (viewing and configuring)
  • Cloud Management
  • Front-end (IP: port), back-end servers based on limited cloud load balance users
  • Unlimited Users
  • Configuration management and welcome API via REST / JSON web service and SSH
  • Multiple-use architecture configuration management through the Configuration API

    • Protocol authentication (HTTP)
    • Denial of service attacks (DoS, DDoS), worms, SQL code injections, etc. protection against situations
    • Management of black / white lists
    • Rewriting and Redirecting URLs
    • Advanced URL filtering and authentication-based restriction capability
    • Preventing information leaks and protecting sensitive information
    • Filtering HTTP / HTTPS queries and responses
    • HTTP header management

    • Unlimited IP port management using virtual server
    • Creating detailed application logs in an environment outside of the servers (server resources are idle)
    • TCP / HTTP acceleration through buffering
    • Adjusting server link density with dynamic load balancing
    • Blocking malicious or unnecessary HTTP queries

    • Total Application Security Platform® on SSD can be adapted to major commercial hardware platforms (including Dell, IBM, NEC, HP, SuperMicro and Tyan), so companies, hosting providers and data centers that have master contracts with a manufacturer; it does not have to integrate heterogeneous hardware into its existing environments.

    • The Total Application Security Platform® on the SSD provides all available layer 4 (network) and 7 (application) full capabilities for hardware devices. Processing performance depends on the hardware platform.

    • The Total Application Security Platform® Virtual Appliance is designed to be seamlessly integrated into virtual environments or architectures designed for cloud computing.
    • The functions of the Total Application Security Platform® can be used as follows:
      • VMware™
      • Microsoft Hyper-V™
      • Citrix XenServer™
      • Red Hat™ Enterprise Virtualization
      • KVM (Kernel-based Virtual Machine)
      • Xen
      • Virtual images.
